attributes.action: Ask all heads of Media (TV; Radio;Newspapers) to be positive on the Economy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are in a strategic moment in time and the Bail-out is at present the only solution in order to solve the problem into keeping the economy solvent.Appoint positive people and cut jobs of the negatives in the first place as they are responsible and accountable. Ask all heads of Media (TV; Radio;Newspapers) to be positive on the Economy. Should they (-and their sub-ordinates),not adhere - they should be the first to go as they have no future!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
